name: Rollercars
description:
Use the mouse wheel (or your down arrow) to charge your car! Then release and steer with arrow keys to see how far you can go. Alt Ctrl Pro-tip: Flip the mouse around, press the wheel down and drag as far as you can...

A game for Alt Ctrl at Home 2020 harkening back to the days when implausibly coloured tiny cars could be wound up for days and let loose in the house to travel across millions of kilometres of adventurous terrain. 

How to use your mouse:
https://imgur.com/a/vGbY35U

Works best in fullscreen mode.
